010package imagingbook.common.threshold.global;
011
012/**
013 * @author WB
014 * @version 2022/08/01
015 *
016 */
017public class MeanThresholder implements GlobalThresholder {
018        
019        public MeanThresholder() {
020                super();
021        }
022
023        @Override
024        public int getThreshold(int[] h) {
025                // calculate mean of entire image:
026                int K = h.length;
027                int cnt = 0;
028                long sum = 0;
029                for (int i=0; i<K; i++) {
030                        cnt += h[i];
031                        sum += i * h[i];
032                }
033                
034                int mean = (int) Math.rint((double)sum / cnt);
035
036                // count resulting background pixels:
037                int n0 = 0;
038                for (int i = 0; i <= mean; i++) {
039                        n0 += h[i];
040                }
041                
042                // determine if background or foreground is empty:
043                int q = (n0 < cnt) ? mean : -1; 
044                return q;
045        }
046}
